item.title: monthly reviews (2025)
item.description:
jan 2025

written up in early march, so relying mostly on notes than memories or emotions -

  • asian art museum (haikyuu), moma (amy sherman - quite exquisite but so crowded on the free day, couldn’t make myself stay very long)
  • christine, museum of art and crafts
  • started running agian, ran mostly consistently-ish (listening to a podcast helps)
  • cooking at home more
  • stopped progestin
  • connor’s second el abrazo milonga
  • worked on this site
  • draw with tunan (~3 days) - quite nourishing but difficult to do on my own
  • seafood lover’s cooking class with connor / belated birthday gift
  • manon ballet with marissa - how lovely
  • transformation guild folks chat
  • had lunch with maryanne,

feb 2025

a relatively quiet month - went back to MD for a large part of it.

item.title: books
item.description: a note or two about the books i’ve been reading, so i remember what i’ve read, and what i thought about them.
